title: SlashEvent
description: Event where funds are taken from the Mars pool to cover a shortfall. The loss is covered proportionally by all owners of the Mars pool (xMars holders and users with an open claim)

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
